description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nHeartstrings:
At the end of each enemy's turn, they {ACTION_cast} one of their spells. After an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CURSED} {ACTION_casts} a spell, they take damage equal 20% of this creature's {STAT_intelligence}. This trait does not stack.
name: Seance Lace
